thread.title_full: New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case - The Item Extra - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The Item Extra
title: New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case - The Item Extra
text:
" Bill Cosby has replaced his longtime lawyer in a pair of lawsuits filed by women claiming they were sexually abused by the comedian decades ago. Cosby's new attorney, Christopher Tayback, filed a form on Friday reflecting that he was replacing Cosby's longtime attorney, Martin Singer, in the case.
Start the conversation, or Read more at The Item Extra.
